issue.message: Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 1, "action", in androidx.test.uiautomator.UiDevice.performActionAndWait) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions
